text: The suspense is real! Serena Williams and her fiancé, Alexis Ohanian, are waiting to learn the sex of their baby, the tennis champ revealed at the 2017 Met Gala on Monday, May 1. “ We ’ re waiting. [ It ’ s ] a surprise, ” Williams, 35, told Vogue ‘ s André Leon Talley at the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City. “ We call it ‘ baby.'” In the meantime, the couple, who announced their engagement last December, are trying to figure out living arrangements. “ That ’ s the question of the hour, ” the athlete told Talley when asked if she ’ ll relocate to Ohanian ’ s current home in San Francisco. “ I couldn ’ t be stuck in a more beautiful place. ” One thing that Williams and
